name: Let there be Cat-Hos
description:
Hello all,

First, I'm sorry, I had a bug in WebGL, so I published it in download version at the very last second

This is a little game where you have to avoid the chaos created by your (countless) kitten

Controls : LEFT - RIGHT or just click left / right of the screen (it was supposed to be mobile friendly)

===

I wished I had more time to improve the looking of it, I wanted to created a good looking apartment matching the shelf

As I said earlier, it's supposed to be mobile friendly, that's why it's only a shelf xD, but as you have to download it ... well ... it's ugly haha
